1.title: Team Big Steel
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Team Monkey Business
2.plot: A father-son team of inventors attempt to build a bar requiring each patron to prove their "man" skills before they're poured a drink. However, the team must first prove they have the woodworking skills to get the bar finished in time.

3.title: Team Robotics
3.plot: A team of robotics experts attempts to build a fully mechanized bar from the ground up. Can these first time bar builders come through? Or will their idea be too ambitious to complete in time?

4.title: Team Tool Shed
4.plot: A team of independent contractors attempt to create a tool shed that transforms into a working bar. However, as the clock ticks down, it becomes clear that the team might be in way over their head.

5.title: Team Wood Work
5.plot: A team of expert furniture designers attempts to create a high-end wooden bar using century old whisky barrels. But, a major problem occurs when one team member is not up to the task.

6.title: Team Hot Rod
6.plot: A team of expert mechanics attempts to create a hydraulics-powered bar using the front end of '53 Chevy. But, an unexpected setback could threaten to jeopardize the entire build.

imdb.plot outline: From the Emmy-Award winning creators of Deadliest Catch and Storage Wars comes Raising the Bar, a new reality series that pushes builders to their limits. Six teams of expert craftsmen. One challenge: build the ultimate hand-crafted bar, before time runs out. With reputations on the line it's build or bust.
imdb.title: Raising the Bar
plot: From the Emmy-Award winning creators of Deadliest Catch and Storage Wars comes _Raising the Bar_ (qv), a new reality series that pushes builders to their limits. Six teams of expert craftsmen. One challenge: build the ultimate hand-crafted bar, before time runs out. With reputations on the line it's build or bust.::anonymous
